title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: At MdStore, we prioritize the privacy of your data and the security of your store. Here's how we protect your information.
collection_desc: We only collect data necessary to run your store, such as name, email, and payment information to ensure a smooth selling experience.
usage_desc: Your data is used to improve our services, process orders, and provide intelligent reports that help you make better business decisions.
protection_desc: We use advanced encryption technologies and global security standards to protect your data from any unauthorized access.
sharing_desc: We never sell your data. We only share it with trusted service providers (like payment gateways) to complete your business transactions.
updates_desc: We update this policy periodically to ensure compliance with the latest security standards.
